en.notEnoughSlippage: The transaction failed, please check your Maximum Deposit Rate
en.availableLiquidityError: There is not enough liquidity in this pool
en.generalError: There was an error, please try again
en.noCollateral: You don't have enough collateralized assets in the Variable Rate Pool
en.borrowLimit: You can't borrow more than your borrow limit
en.fixedRateBorrowExplanation: Fixed rate borrow takes tokens from Exactly and deposits into your wallet resulting in fixed debt.
